zest.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She had a great zest for life.
zest.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the quality of being exciting and interesting
zest.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The danger of being caught added a certain zest to the affair.
zest.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the outer skin of an orange or lemon, used in cooking
zest.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a yellow soap with a lemon smell which is used for washing the face and body, sold in the US
